data.title: Paul Stephenson Jewellery
data.meta_description: Paul Stephenson Jewellery is classic, unique, contemporary, hand crafted silver jewellery that often incorporates recycled elements such as Seaglass. Each bespoke piece is handmade with love & passion in the UK by me especially for you. Commissions also welcomed.
data.text:
''I commissioned a pendant from Paul using my own much loved precious gemstone and I was so impressed with the whole experience. Paul went above and beyond, keeping me informed every step of the way about each aspect of the design and making process - providing sketches, photos and film clips, which I very much appreciated - and the finished piece was made to perfection!! üòç‚ù§Ô∏è I am so thrilled with my unique pendant and I wouldn't hesitate to commission another piece or to recommend his outstanding workmanship. Thank you so much, Paul!''

‚Äã

Lucy

Paul has been amazing from start to finish - updating me with progress, discussing exactly what I was after, open to try the different things I was looking for, and the quality of work was absolutely amazing. I worked in the jewellery trade for a decade and with a lot of jobbers/goldsmiths/silversmiths and his work is stunning. Super accommodating, reasonably priced, and makes things in good time. Will be using again and would recommend to anyone!

The colours in the stone are gorgeous and the quality of the mount is perfect. Also the chain is perfectly made and designed to a high standard. I certainly will enjoy wearing it.

My experience with Paul, from initial conversations around design to the final piece arriving, was brilliant. The lightning bolt is precisely what I imagined - if not even better. If you want beautifully crafted jewellery with a personal touch and excellent service, I would recommend Paul in a heartbeat.

The ring I ordered from Paul is absolutely stunning, and he allowed me to pick the piece of sea glass and made it to my size. Delivery was amazingly fast, and the quality is second to none. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

It‚Äôs stunning! I couldn‚Äôt be happier and it‚Äôs exactly, if not better, than I had hoped. This will be the ring I wear everyday! Ignore the bony hand - I feel a manicure and a bit of fake tan are on the cards now! Thank you so much and have a wonderful Christmas xxx

Dear Paul,

‚Äã

I just wanted to share this photo with you. My new necklace is just perfect for wearing with my uniform! I am really, really pleased with it.

I love jewellery and your silversmithing is exceptional quality. I love the fact that the broken glass has been washed up by the sea and you have found it and turned it into a beautiful object to be kept forever. Thank you so much.

As I‚Äôve just found you, rest assured I will be a repeat customer!

‚Äã

I grew up treasure hunting with my mum and brother on beaches, treasure being sea glass, stones with holes in and fossils. For her 70th birthday next month I have bought her this absolutely stunning bracelet my friend @paulstephensonjewellery created, it is so beautiful the photos don't do it justice, I know she'll love it and it is a real treasure. Check out his website you won't regret it, every piece is handcrafted and unique. Support a small creative business, you won't be disappointed.

https://www.paulstephensonjewellery.com

Lauren H

‚Äã

I met Paul when I lived in York, England, as a graduate student, 2022 will be 30 years ago! It‚Äôs been so great to reconnect with him on social media. Now I‚Äôm so proud of him for his really amazing jewelry making! His material is sea glass he finds on various English seaside locations! I just purchased these two pieces from @paulstephensonjewellery. Just received them here in the United States and I couldn‚Äôt be more excited!

Leonard

My sister in law said that it is one of the nicest gifts anyone has ever got her, (she is an artist) and said it's like she had drawn the design for herself and I should tell you that you have a very special gift. Thank you again.
